title: USSR
content: The Soviet Union or Union of Socialist Soviet Republics (U.S.S.R) was a Communist state that existed in the last century, between 1922 and 1991. At that time, it was the largest country in the world, spread over two continents, Asia and Europe, and eleven time zones. The Soviet Union was the most powerful Communist country that ever existed.
author: Borovoy E. N.
